Chemical.content:
Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Granisetron was well tolerated at all doses .

Explanation:

In the given paragraph, the only chemical entity mentioned is "Granisetron". It is a medication used to prevent nausea and vomiting caused by chemotherapy and radiation therapy. Therefore, the markdown table above contains one row with the chemical name "Granisetron" in the "Chemical" column.
